cause.description:
Too many children in the United States are without proper healthcare. It is important that all children, regardless of socio-economic status, race, or gender are provided with the proper treatments. Proper healthcare allows children to be successful. No child should be denied medical in such a wealthy nation.
1. Provide Healthcare Coverage for Children
2. Expand and appropriately fund the State Children's Health Insurance Program
cause.mission: Provide children with necessary health services and medical insurance
cause.name: Support Children's Healthcare Coverage
